operations.action: template-Hi, how can I help you Today?

template-A digital enterprise is an organization that uses technology as a competitive advantage in its internal and external operations. Tata Consultancy Services’ (TCS’) Digital Enterprise unit adapts the capabilities of the digital five forces—Mobility and Pervasive Computing, Big Data and Analytics, Social Media, Cloud Computing, and Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Robotics— to the unique needs and opportunities of each industry. DESS help clients harness data, use multiple channels to promote customer centricity, enhance customer and stakeholder engagement, and drive innovation while reducing operational overheads.
template-The digital revolution has impacted enterprises globally on an unprecedented scale. Did you find it interesting? Do you want to checkout DESS story.
template-http://www.tcs.com/SiteCollectionDocuments/Brochures/Digital-Enterprise-Solutions-Services-0714-1.pdf
template-Which sub domain would you like to explore?

template-Mobility is the foundation of the digital enterprise, which will include the Internet of things, social, analytics and crowdsourcing. Mobility is now the core of IT; it's pretty much the focus everywhere.  Mobility and Pervasive Computing: consumer and enterprise mobility services, including mobility strategy consulting, application development, maintenance, testing, security, and user experience and engagement.

template-Social Media: cloud based social business solutions to help companies engage, listen, and respond to customer needs, crowdsource ideas, and analyze comments and feedback to realign brand strategies. Social media handles projects like Tata EDGE, TI, Group innovation managements, TI PLUS, GE Health and so on.

template-Cloud application services including application strategy, development, management, and governance. Cloud supports all cloud consumption or service models, and enable seamless management and migration across cloud environments, and automation of service delivery

template-Big Data and Analytics: services for information & data management and analytics, Big Data solutions that enable clients to store, process, manage, and analyze large volumes of disparate data
template-Visit http://www.tcs.com/SiteCollectionDocuments/Brochures/Digital-Enterprise-Solutions-Services-0714-1.pdf to understand in detail.

branches.user: I'd like to check the other domains

operations.action: template-Thanks, have a great day ahead.

turns.user: Would you help me in learning?

operations.action: template-Great... What would you like to learn?
template-Ahh! thats a nice topic. Amazon Web Services (AWS), a subsidiary of Amazon.com, offers a suite of cloud-computing services that make up an on-demand computing platform.
template-AWS is located in 16 geographical regions. Each Region has multiple Availability Zones, which are distinct data centers providing AWS services.

branches.user: Cool, I am interested to know more about AWS products

operations.action: template-AWS provides a list of products.
template-Which option you would like to explore?

template-Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud, also known as EC2 is an IaaS service providing virtual servers controllable by an API Xen. Equivalent services include Google Compute Engine and Rack space or on-premises equivalents such as OpenStack or Eucalyptus. Amazon Elastic Beanstalk provides a PaaS service for hosting applications, equivalent services include Google App Engine or Heroku or OpenShift for on-premises use.

template-Amazon Route 53 provides a scalable Managed DNS service providing Domain Name Services. Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) creates a logically isolated set of AWS resources which can be connected using a VPN connection. This competes against on-premises solutions such as OpenStack or HPE Helion Eucalyptus used in conjunction with PaaS software.

template-Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) provides Web Service based storage. Amazon Glacier provides long-term storage options (compared to S3). High redundancy and availability, but low-frequent access times. Intended for archiving data. Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS) provides persistent block-level storage volumes for EC2.

template-Amazon DynamoDB provides a scalable, low-latency NoSQL online Database Service backed by SSDs. Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS) provides scalable database servers with MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and PostgreSQL support.
template-AWS CodeDeploy provides automated code deployment to EC2 instances. AWS Elastic Beanstalk provides deployment and management of applications in the cloud.

template-Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR) Provides a PaaS service delivering Hadoop for running MapReduce queries framework running on the web-scale infrastructure of EC2 and Amazon S3. Amazon Machine Learning a service that assists developers of all skill levels to use machine learning technology.
template-Thank you, would you like to know about DESS?

turns.user: Can you guide me on how to create challenge?

operations.action: template-Sure
template-May I know which type of challenge you wanna create?
template-local or global challenge?
template- Well, a challenge is categoriesed into four categories. Select any type to know more.

template-Normal Challenges: Those that can be posted from a Category/Subcategory or a Community to one or more Companies.Ideas posted to these challenges will be visible to all the users of the chosen companies.

template-IP Specific: Special challenges which can be posted from a Category/Subcategory or a Community to one or more Companies. Do note that ideas posted to this challenge are visible only to the Idea owner and the Challenge owner. Also these challenges need to be approved by Company admin before they get published.

template-CWS: Challenge Worth Solving are special challenges posted during the bi-annual CWS period.These challenges need to be approved by the Admins prior to getting published. These challenges are visible to all the Companies of TATA Ideas Portal.Hackathon is a company event. Managed by company admin. Tagged company users can post idea to a Hacathon.
template-You next step is to pick category/subcategory OR community.
template-Please select category and subcategory from dropdown.

template-Enter you challenge title. Make your title clear to get more ideas and views. Keep your title short(within 140 characters), interesting and to the point. The more interesting your title, the better the responses.
template-Moving on to the next step....Describe the problem that you intend to untangle in an interesting manner which would encourage users to think innovatively. You may attach documents if needed.
template-Provide the tags, it will help people to search your challenge easily.
template-Next step is to enter past attempts to solve this challenge
template-Enter last date to submit idea
template-Enter result announcement date
template-Provide Rate Criterias
template-Wanna edit bounty points?
template-You're done...Submit your challenge.
template-Please read the error message clearly and try to fix it. In case, you still face any issue please contact our IT Team XYZ. Thank you.
template-Bounty Points and a Prize (description + image) that the winning ideas would receive. If you want to add a new prize or image, contact your Company Administrator.

template-Rate Criterias - Add rate criteria that would be used to rate the Ideas posted to the Challenge. Every rate criteria is having title and description, you can give multiple criteria but total weightage should be 100.
template-Skiping...
template-Appropriate tags which will make the Challenge more searchable
template-Kindly pick communities from the list provided.

turns.user: unable to see CWS challenge I posted

operations.action: template-Dear User. As you've posted challenge to cws event, it will be visible only after admin approval. In case, Admin doesn't approve, it will get auto approve at the challenge submission phase end.
template-Only Admin can create cws event. Once the event is created, all the users can post participate.
template-Only Company Admin can host Hacathon event. It can be tagged to multiple companies and all the tagged companies can participate.

operations.action: template-You can edit your edit only in certain phases like idea submission, refinement phase. Additionaly, you van enhance your  idea in value addition phase.
